markdown.markdown:
```{r include = F}
df <- read.csv(file = './AmongUsData/amongus.csv',
                header = T)
str(df)
df$Team <- as.factor(df$Team)
df$Outcome <- as.factor(df$Outcome)
df$All_Tasks_Completed <- as.factor(df$All_Tasks_Completed)
df$Murdered <- as.factor(df$Murdered)
df$Ejected <- as.factor(df$Ejected)
str(df)

crew <- df[df$Team == 'Crewmate',]
imposter <- df[df$Team == 'Imposter', ]
```



```{r}
prop.table(table(df$Team)) 

plot(prop.table(table(df$Team)))
```



```{r}
levels(crew$Outcome)
table(crew$Outcome)
prop.table(table(crew$Outcome))
prop.table(table(imposter$Outcome))

wl.logit <- glm(Outcome ~ Game_Length, data = df,
                family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
summary(wl.logit)

```


```{r}
table(df$Team)
str(df)
```
